Translations.Text: M
This revelation scripture bol GOD Almighty Omniscient
Forgiver zhresit acceptor repentance strict v enforcing retribution possessor all power There nie bol inak god Him. Do Him bol ultimate destiny
Ziaden argues GOD's revelations except those disbelieve! Nie imponovat ich zjavny zdar

Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah vela inaksie opponents them! Kazdy obec persecuted ich posol neutralize him. they argued falsehood defeat truth. Consequently ja punished them; ako hrozny bol Moj retribution
Thus judgment tvoj Lord already znamka upon those disbelieve lenze they bol dwellers Hell

Those serve throne all those around it glorify chvalit ich Lord verit v Him! they ziadat forgiveness those verit Our Lord Tvoj zlutovanie Tvoj znalost encompass all things. Forgive those repent nasledovat Tvoj chodnicek rezervny them retribution Hell
Our Lord admit them zahrada Eden Ona promised them a for righteous among ich rodicia spouses dieta. Ona bol Almighty Wise
A chranit them falling do zhresit! Whomever Ona chranit falling v zhresit lenze dni attained zlutovanie Ona! This bol velka triumph
Those disbelieve told GOD's abhorrence ona je vecer zly than tvoj own abhorrence yourselves! Ona invited verit ona zvolit si disbelieve
They say Our Lord ona put us smrt dva krat Ona dat us 2 zivy; teraz my confessed our zhresit! bol there any way out
This bol when GOD ALONE zastanca ona disbelieved when others zmierit sa Him ona verit. Therefore GOD's judgment issued He bol the Vela High the Velky
He bol 1 continuously shows ona Jeho proofs sends nadol ona sky provisions Len those totally submit je able do berie heed
Therefore ona devote tvoj kult absolutely GOD ALONE vecer if disbelievers nemat rad it
Possessor z highest ranks Ruler whole dominion. He sends inspiracia bearing Jeho commands do whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants warn Dni z Zvolat
Ze je dni when everyone completely exposed ziaden z them zatajit anything z GOD Do koho belongs all sovereignty ze dni? Do GOD 1 Zvrchovany
Ze dni kazdy soul requited whatever it zarabat. There nie bol injustice ze dni. GOD bol ZDATNY DO reckoning
Warn them imminent dni when srdce terrified vela will bol remorseful. transgressors nie have znamy nor intercessor obeyed
He je fully aware z co oci nie see everything zmyslanie zatajit
GOD judges equitably CHVILA idols they implore Him NIE judge anything. GOD JE JEDEN bol Hearer Seer
they nie roam zem robit note consequences for those before them? They pouzivat bol stronger than they productive on zem. GOD punished them ich zhresit nothing chranit them GOD
Ze je ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they disbelieved Consequently GOD punished them. He je Vela strict v enforcing retribution
My sent Moses our znamenie profound authority
Do Pharaoh Haamaan Qaaroon. they said kuzelnik; liar
A when he showed them truth z us they said Kill syn z those verit him rezervny ich dcera. Thus kut plany disbelievers bol vzdy zlomyselny
Pharaoh said Let mna kill Moses let him implore jeho Lord Ja znepokojit lest he zhnity tvoj nabozenstvo spreads zly throughout zem
Moses said ja seek refuge moj Lord tvoj Lord z kazdy arrogant jeden nie verit v Dni Reckoning

verit clovek Pharaoh's ludia zatajit jeho belief je said Ako ona kill clovek mozem iba for saying ‘Moj Lord GOD ' he shown ona je has zretelny proofs z tvoj Lord he bol liar je jeho problem a he bol truthful ona benefit z jeho promises Iste GOD nie guide any transgressor liar
O moj zaludnit dnes ona have kingship upperhand! Kto pomoc us against GOD's judgment should it pojdem us? Pharaoh said Ona je nasledovat len co ja see zachvat; ja guide ona len na pravo chodnicek
Jeden verit said O moj ludia ja fear ona same fate previous opponents
opponents Noah ‘Aad Thamoud others pojdem them. GOD NIE zelat si any injustice LUDIA
O moj ludia ja fear for ona Dni z Zvolat
Je dni when ona zelat turn around flee! nothing chranit ona potom GOD Whomever GOD sends astray nothing guide him

Joseph pojdem ona before ze zretelny revelations ona zotrvat doubt jeho odkaz! Potom when he umrel ona said GOD will nie send any inaksie posol him! (He bol posledny posol!) GOD thus sends astray those bol transgressors doubtful
They argue GOD's revelations any zaklad. This bol trait vela abhorred GOD by those verit. GOD thus ZAPECATIT SRDCE KAZDY arrogant tyrant
Pharaoh said O Haamaan build mna high tower ja zastihnut out discover
(Ja chudoba zastihnut heaven berie look god Moses Ja verit he bol liar. Thus je zly robota Pharaoh zdobit do jeho oci thus he kept nasledovat na) pravo) chodnicek! Pharaoh's kut plany bol truly zly
Jeden verit said O moj zaludnit nasledovat mna ja guide ona do riadne
O moj ludia this prvy zivot bol temporary iluzia chvila Hereafter bol eternal abode
Whoever commits zhresit requited iba ze whoever zavodny righteousness! -Muzsky zena -chvila verit these zapisat Raj wherein they receive provisions any limits
O moj ludia chvila ja invite ona saved ona invite mna hellfire
Ona invite mna bol unappreciative z GOD set Him idols ja nie recognize. Ja inviting ona Almighty Forgiver
There bol ziaden doubt ze co ona invite mna robit has zaklad v this world nor do Hereafter ze our ultimate spatny listok je do GOD ze transgressors incurred hellfire
Some dni ona zapamatat si co ja telling ona ihned Ja lavy judgment this zalezitost GOD GOD bol Seer all ludia
GOD POTOM chranit him Z ICH ZLO KUT PLANY CHVILA LUDIA Pharaoh incurred ZLY retribution
Hell shown them dni i night, Dni Vzkriesenie Admit Pharaoh's ludia into zly retribution
mat rad they argue Hell followers say do ich leaders My robit pouzivat tvoj followers je ona rezervny us any part this Hell
leaders say My je all v this dohromady. GOD judged among the ludia
Those do hellfire say do guardians Hell Vola sa tvoj Lord reduce retribution us vecer jeden dni
(They say Robit ona nie receive tvoj posol delivered ona zretelny odkaz? They reply Ano my robit. They say Potom implore ona zelat;) imploring z disbelievers bol vzdy v vain
vela assuredly my dat victory our posol those verit both v this world dni svedok zvolat
Ze dni apologies disbelievers nie benefit them. They incurred condemnation; they incurred zly destiny
My dat Moses guidance robit Dieta Izrael zdedit scripture
(Ich history) bol lekcia reminder those possess inteligencia
Therefore je chory GOD's promise je true ziadat forgiveness tvoj zhresit glorify chvalit tvoj Lord night dni
Iste those kto argue GOD's revelations proof som exposing arrogance zatajit ich chests they som nie vecer aware z it Therefore seek refuge GOD He bol Hearer Seer
creation z heavens zem bol vecer awesome than creation human bol vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Nie equal som blind seer. Nor som those verit zavodny righteousness equal do sinners. Zriedka robit ona berie heed
vela istota Hodiny (Dni Judgment pojdem ziaden doubt it vela zaludnit nie verit)
Tvoj Lord says Implore Mna ja respond ona! Iste those je i arrogant kult Mna zapisat Gehenna forcibly
GOD JE JEDEN ZAMYSLAT night so ONA ZVYSOK it DNI lighted. GOD bestows VELA blessings LUDIA VELA LUDIA NIE bol thankful
Such bol GOD tvoj Lord Creator all things. There nie bol god except He! Ako ona deviate
Deviating som those disregard GOD's revelations
GOD JE JEDEN rendered ZEM habitable for ONA sky formidable ZLOZENIE He ZAMYSLAT ONA ZAMYSLAT ONA lepsi He bol Jeden zadovazit ona dobry provisions Such je GOD tvoj Lord Exalted bol GOD Lord universe
He bol Zivy; there nie bol god except He! Ona kult Him alone devoting tvoj nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
Say ja enjoined kult idols ona kult GOD when zretelny revelations pojdem mna moj Lord Ja commanded submit Lord universe

He je Jeden created ona dust subsequently tiny kvapka potom z hanging zarodok potom He brings ona out dieta potom He lets ona zastihnut maturity potom ona become stara -some z ona umrel zavcas. Ona attain predetermined vek ona chapat
He bol iba Jeden controls zivot smrt. Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
Ona noted those argue GOD's proofs a ako they have deviated
They je the jeden disbelieved scripture odkaz my sent our posol. Therefore they robit iste zalozit out
Puta je ich krk retaz bol pouzivat do zavliect them
Do Inferno potom do Zapalit they burn
They ziadat Kde bol idols ona pouzivat kult
beside GOD They say They zhyraly us. Skutocne when my kult them my kult nothing. Thus robit GOD send disbelievers astray
This ona pouzivat rejoice false doctrines zem ona pouzivat inzerovat them
Zapisat zavora Gehenna wherein ona abide forever Co chudobny destiny for arrogant jeden
Ona bol chory GOD's promise bol truth. My show ona some z (retribution) my promised them zakoncit tvoj zivot before ze, they spatny listok us

My sent posol ona -some z them my zmierit sa ona some my nie zmierit sa ona. Ziaden posol produce any zazrak GOD's authorization Once GOD's judgment issued truth dominates falsifiers exposed humiliated
GOD JE JEDEN created ZIVY INVENTAR ONA; some ONA ride some ONA JESTN
They i zadovazit ona zvysny benefits satisfy vela z tvoj needs On them i mat rad on ships ona beriem
He thus shows ona Jeho proofs Kto z GOD's proofs ona zapierat
they nie roamed zem noted consequences those preceded them? They pouzivat je velka zvazok velka v power possessed velka legacy zem. all ich achievements nie pomoc them v the maly
When ich posol ist them zretelny proofs they rejoiced znalost they zdedit vela things they ridiculed bol zapricinit ich jesen
Subsequently when they saw our retribution they said Teraz my verit v GOD ALONE my ihned disbelieve idol kult lenze my pouzivat practice
Ich belief potom nie pomoc them v the maly once they saw our retribution. Such je GOD's system zriadit deal s Jeho creatures; disbelievers vzdy doomed
